servicesSection.ourServicesSubtitle: Your Partner in Innovative Digital Health Solutions

serviceCard1.title: UI/UX Design
serviceCard1.subtitle: Crafting Intuitive Experiences
serviceCard1.description: Create intuitive and engaging user interfaces that enhance the overall experience for patients and healthcare providers, ensuring that digital health solutions are user-friendly and accessible.

serviceCard2.title: Branding & Identity
serviceCard2.subtitle: Creating Brand Excellence
serviceCard2.description: Develop impactful brand identities that resonate with target audiences, effectively communicating the values and mission of healthcare organizations through thoughtful design.

serviceCard3.title: Digital Product
serviceCard3.subtitle: Transforming Ideas into Reality
serviceCard3.description: Design and build innovative digital health products, from mobile apps to web platforms, that address real-world healthcare challenges and improve patient engagement and outcomes.

footer.address: Ziro sp. z o.o., ul. Mogilska 43 31-545 Kraków, Poland
footer.description: Ziro is a design-driven creative technology company that combines design services with digital health product development, offering UI/UX design, branding, and product development for healthcare companies and startups.

wyZiroSection.title: Why Choose Ziro?
wyZiroSection.description: Ziro is a partner in innovation, dedicated to creating impactful digital health solutions that enhance patient care and engagement. Collaborate to transform healthcare through exceptional design.

ziroPhilosophy.title: Ziro's Philosophy: The Art of Nearness
ziroPhilosophy.subtitle: Based on idea
ziroPhilosophy.description1: At Ziro, we believe innovation in digital health stems from balancing proximity and distance. By closely collaborating with clients and users to understand their needs while maintaining some separation to challenge assumptions, we create solutions that integrate seamlessly into patients' and healthcare providers' lives.
ziroPhilosophy.description2: We view perfection as a continuous journey, aiming for "close to perfect" through iterative design processes that adapt to evolving user needs and technologies. Our core philosophy emphasizes that "perfection in proximity" is essential for transforming digital health and enhancing patient care and engagement.

onePagePlan.title: One-Page Solution
onePagePlan.description: Streamlined, engaging, and effective designs for maximum impact in a single scroll!

multiPagePlan.title: Multi-Page Solution
multiPagePlan.description: Unlock the power of multi-page design for a seamless, engaging user experience!

faq.title: Our faqs.
faq.subtitle: The most common questions we get asked.

one-page.question: What types of services does Ziro offer?
one-page.answer: Ziro specializes in UI/UX design, branding, website and app design, and creative campaigns specifically tailored for the digital health sector. Our goal is to create user-centric solutions that enhance patient engagement and improve healthcare delivery.

multi-page-benefits.question: How does Ziro approach project collaboration?
multi-page-benefits.answer: Ziro follows a structured process that includes discovery, ideation, design, and testing. This collaborative approach ensures that client needs are thoroughly understood and integrated into every stage of the project.

timeline.question: What industries does Ziro focus on?
timeline.answer: Ziro primarily focuses on the digital health industry, creating solutions for various domains such as mental health, fitness and wellness, telehealth, patient engagement platforms, and more.

mobile-friendly.question: How does Ziro ensure quality in its designs?
mobile-friendly.answer: Quality is a top priority at Ziro. We conduct thorough usability testing and gather feedback from users and stakeholders throughout the design process to identify and resolve any issues before launch.

support.question: Can Ziro help with existing projects?
support.answer: Yes! Ziro can collaborate on existing projects to enhance design, improve user experience, or develop new features. We are open to working with clients at any stage of their project.

additional-features.question: How long does a typical project take?
additional-features.answer: Project timelines vary based on complexity and scope. After the initial discovery phase, we provide a detailed timeline tailored to your specific project needs.

choose-type.question: What is Ziro’s approach to user feedback?
choose-type.answer: User feedback is integral to our design process. We actively seek input during testing phases to refine solutions and ensure they meet user needs effectively.

get-started.question: How can I get started with Ziro?
get-started.answer: To get started, you can schedule a consultation using our Book a Call(Calendly link) or email us directly at nikhil@ziro.space /nsingh2075@gmail.com. We look forward to discussing your needs and exploring how we can collaborate!

stayInformedSection.title: Stay Informed
stayInformedSection.subtitle: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive updates on our latest projects, insights, and industry news.

nikhil.quote: At Ziro, we're passionate about how design shapes brand value. We see design as the silent ambassador of a brand, creating connections that go beyond the ordinary. Our mission is to craft engaging experiences that resonate with people and build trust, ensuring every interaction leaves a meaningful impression.
